doc.title: Появился оф. арт октябрьского аниме Girlfriend (Kari).
doc.author: NasuVers
doc.text: Адаптация игры-дейтсима для смартфонов. Список сейю (ну и зацените количество девушек): Kaori Nazuka as Fumio Murakami Sakura Tange as Chloe Lemaire Satomi Satou as Kokomi Shiina Hitomi Harada as Erena Mochizuki Rina Satou as Akane Sakurai Haruka Tomatsu as Nonoka Sasahara Kaori Ishihara as Yuzuko Hazuki Kikuko Inoue as Kanata Amatsu Aoi Yūki as Isuzu Shiranui Yukari Tamura as Koruri Tokitani Minori Chihara as Mahiro Natsume Minako Kotobuki as Saya Kagurazaka Minami Tsuda as Mutsumi Shigino Maaya Uchida as Nao Miyoshi Rie Kugimiya as Matsuri Kagami Emiri Katō as Rino Suzukawa Houko Kuwashima as Shinobu Kokonoe Noriko Shitaya as Remi Tamai Ayahi Takagaki as Tsugumi Harumiya Ai Kayano as Haruko Yumesaki vk.com/anireact
